title: The minimum area of a building plot shall be as mentioned in the layout
clause_text: The minimum area of a building plot shall be as mentioned in the layout. No building plot as shown in the layout shall be sub-divided.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum area of a building plot shall be as mentioned in the layout. No building plot as shown in the layout shall be sub-divided.
